answers.answer: I've had 3 and this one will be one to my first was at 37 weeks because I had gestational diabetes and he got so big he was 10' 12 then my next 2 was both scheduled at 38 I think 38 and 39 weeks is the normal
My friend is scheduled for her c section at 39 weeks, but I don't really have experience in that department.
I will be having one and my ob said one week before my due date :) hope that helps

One week before your due date is standard. I am due Feb.14 with my third, and they have me scheduled for the 7th. :) They did tell me that after the 37th week mark if I happened to go into labor to go to the hospital and they would do it then.
My doctor's office won't do it until 39 weeks unless there's complications or you go into labor before then. I'm due the 14th and am having one on the 7th.
The office i was at said 39 wks also

Had mine at 39 weeks. My doctor said they prefer the baby to stay in the womb if possible. My second one is due June 1st, so they said they'll probably schedule it for last week of May which is awesome. My husband and my son share the same birth month. Now I will share my birth month with our daughter.

question: Just curious because Im having One.
title: when is the normal time they perform csections?
